name: Basketball President Manager PRO 🏀
description:
Do you have what it takes to be in charge of an entire pro basketball team and named President of Basketball Operations?
Basketball President Manager is a free sports strategy game in which you take control of a basketball team in a professional league for several seasons. Build your own dinasty. Our goal is not to make an ultra-realistic sports management game, but a simple game that is easy to use and allows to feel the sensation of carrying a team to win a ring.

Become a upward soccer coach pro basketball manager as in NBA... Play as basketball manager !

You can either choose one of the available 30 teams from different cities or create your own city.

Sell basketball star as strong as NBA Superstar ! Switch !

-Be patient and make sure you manage your sports manager club the way it deserves.

Play basketball manager games, sell basketball simulator star, play as basketball manager
Travel around the world challenging the best teams and usa basketball team of each nation, win tournaments to unlock new agent carter cities.

Each player has multiple offensive and defensive skills, improve their ball shooting in basketball stadium , offensive and defensive rebounds, blocks, assists, free throws and much more ¡Dunk your team until the victory!

Daily basketball stadium and sports manager trainings will help you to improve their skills, if they work, they can turn into all-star legends, manage your team,and become a legend of this sport. Field throws, dunks, blocks, rebounds... all your players need to reach the glory

Basketball President Manager (full game) Main Features at a Glance:
• Friendly Interface with neat and clean design and managerial games.
• Build your own basketball team and better than the best NBA Teams
• Get in touch with Players’ agent and negotiate over transfers as in NBA.
• Get new sponsors and official partner for fund raising
• Realistic transfer system basketball manager 18
• Upgrade stadium, food & drink shops, Jerseys and souvenirs shops, and more
• Change average ticket price for Home matches management simulation.
• Manage your employees and approve, disapprove or replace them
• Follow different marketing strategies, like TV campaign, advertising, and Charity games
• nba team Fun for all ages and best mlb manager sports strategy games

So, make sure to hire top players for your team, invest in projects with less risk and high ROI, manage the stadium and upgrade the facilities, and most of all try getting through the all Major League Divisions and win nba teams Championship Trophies!
